supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B994 Semiconductor manufacturing equipment that enables “advanced-node integrated circuit” production, as follows (see list of items controls).
Semiconductor wafer fabrication equipment designed for ion implantation of 300mm wafers as follows:
Ion implantation equipment as follows:
history.text:
Having all of the following:
Beam current greater than 1uA and less than 5mA; and
b.2.a.1. Beam current greater than 1uA and less than 5mA; and
Beam energy greater than 5 keV and less than 300 keV; or
b.2.a.2. Beam energy greater than 5 keV and less than 300 keV; or
